worldwar1questions.question: Which country made the first declaration of war?
In what city was Archduke Franz Ferdinand assassinated?
At the beginning of World War I, Bosnia-Herzegovina was part of
To which other prominent leader was Kaiser Wilhelm II of Germany related?
worldwar1questions.answer1: A) Woodrow Wilson of the United States

worldwar1questions.question: Germany’s attack upon which country directly provoked Britain to go to war?
Germany’s plan for fighting France and Russia was called
What key fortress was the scene of the heaviest fighting during the German invasion of Belgium?
Which Russian general lost the Battle of the Masurian Lakes?
Which early battle marked the first major German defeat?
Which best describes Austria-Hungary’s progress early in the war?
worldwar1questions.answer1: A) Defeat by Russia; defeat by Serbia
worldwar1questions.answer2: B) Victory over Russia; defeat by Serbia
worldwar1questions.answer3: C) Defeat by Russia; victory over Serbia
worldwar1questions.answer4: D) Victory over Russia; victory over Serbia
worldwar1questions.correct: A) Defeat by Russia; defeat by Serbia
